title: "Must be level 7 or higher to create a discussion"
body: I keep seeing this everytime I want to make a discussion on any of the other boards, and it makes no sense because I have been level 30 for many months. I haven't seen many other people reporting an issue as similar to this.

replies.body: Sometimes your profile needs to sync to the boards, but you can use the [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)if this is still an issue!
Hey , check out the top of" help & support" there is a sync tool that allows you to sync Yorkshire boarda profile with your game profile
